content: This famous ship sank on her maiden voyage in April 1912 after hitting an iceberg. What is the name of this ship?

Oh, I think I know this one! The ship you're talking about is the Titanic. It was one of the largest and most luxurious passenger ships at the time, and its sinking resulted in a significant loss of life. The disaster led to major improvements in maritime safety regulations. Is there anything else you'd like to know about the Titanic or maritime history in general?
